attributes.action: I want any UK vaccine to be first given to 100 members of parliament publically.
attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to lead by example
attributes.background: parliament says 'we are in this together' parliament says they represent us and our interests, well i want parliament to take the lead and demonstrate that their statements are not simply vibrations in the air.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560861
